extension.name: Multilingual Upload Field
extension.description: The multilingual version of the classic Upload Field.

releases.release: * Added support for defaulting to reference language value * Reworked the JS. Thanks [@iwyg](http://symphony-cms.com/discuss/thread/81854/1/#position-2) * Fixed the unique_name option. It now properly appends the timestamp only when the unique checkbox is checked * Improved error check when saving preferences * Fixed a bug with FLang class not being included * Assets are loaded through `displayPublishPanel()` method
* Fixed a bug with array indexes.
* Fixed a bug where data was fetched in Reference Language instead of Current Language.
